entries.journal_entry_description: Guard the forward watch position and keep any undead from entering the camp.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Wait here while the entry guard takes a break.
entries.task03_comm_message_text: I guess I wasn't clear. You need to stay at the guard post until I call you back. I guess you'll need to try again.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Kill the last of the wave.
entries.task07_comm_message_text: When you are done messing around come back to collect your reward.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Go back to camp and meet with your contact to collect the reward.
entries.task11_comm_message_text: I guess I wasn't clear. You need to stay at the guard post until I call you back. I guess you'll need to try again.
